subject: Olympic Games
Hockey, Ice
Homosexuality
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Rangers goaltender Henrik Lundqvist said he did not agree with a new law in Russia that has been criticized as antigay, but he said he thought sports and politics should be kept separate.
snippet: Rangers goaltender Henrik Lundqvist said he did not agree with a new law in Russia that has been criticized as antigay, but he said he thought sports and politics should be kept separate.
